name: Down Below (NicMagnier)
description:
Pay the devil to travel between the different levels in hell. If you go deep enough you might be able to save your best friend, but can you also save yourself? not if you keep falling in deadly spikes!

Left/Right: Move

X: Jump

Made with Pico-8 for the Ludum Dare 43

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/down-below
